[push]
	default = matching
[commit]
[gpg]
	program = gpg2
[commit]
	gpgsign = true
[core]
	editor = vim
        abbrev = 12
	commitGraph = true
[color]
	ui = true

[pretty]
	fixes = Fixes: %h (\"%s\")
[log]
	showSignature = true
[alias]
	logline = log  --pretty=format:'%Cred%h%Creset -%C(yellow)%d%Creset %s %Cgreen(%cr) %C(bold blue)<%an>%Creset' --abbrev-commit

        gitlog = log --all --graph --pretty=format:'%Cred%h%Creset -%C(auto)%d%Creset %s %Cgreen(%cr) %C(bold blue)<%an>%Creset' --abbrev-commit --date=relative
         state = status -sb
	tags = tag -l
	curtag = "!git describe --abbrev=0"
	tagsfromallbranches = "!git describe --tags $(git rev-list --tags --max-count=1)"
	branches = branch -av
	repoclean = "!git clean -d -f -x"
	remotes = remote -v
	delfiles = "!git ls-files --deleted | xargs git rm"
        sdiff = "!git diff && git submodule foreach 'git diff'"	
	spush = "!git push --recurse-submodules=on-demand"
	supdate = "!git submodule update --remote --merge"
	localcommit = "!git cherry -v"
	updatelinux = "!git push https://unixbhaskar:sunsolaris13@github.com/unixbhaskar/linux.git master"
	updategit = "!git push https://unixbhaskar:sunsolaris13@github.com/unixbhaskar/git.git master"
	muttupdate = "!git push https://unixbhaskar:sunsolaris19@gitlab.com/unixbhaskar/mutt.git master"
        updatei3 = "!git push https://unixbhaskar:sunsolaris13@github.com/unixbhaskar/i3.git next"
        updatebcc = "!git push https://unixbhaskar:sunsolaris13@github.com/unixbhaskar/bcc.git master"
	pushlatestlinuxtag = "!git push https://unixbhaskar:sunsolaris13@github.com/unixbhaskar/linux.git --tags"
        pushlatestgittag = "!git push https://unixbhaskar:sunsolaris13@github.com/unixbhaskar/git.git --tags"
# Show the diff between the latest commit and the current state
        currentstate = "!git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || clear; git --no-pager diff --patch-with-stat"
#show aliases
      aliases = config --get-regexp alias
#interactive rebase 
     reb = "!r() { git rebase -i HEAD~$1; }; r"
# List contributors with number of commits
     contributors = shortlog --summary --numbered
# remove bunch of files at once 
     remove = rm $(git ls-files -d)          
#Gobal pull request fetcher
#git config --global --add remote.origin.fetch "+refs/pull/*/head:refs/remotes/origin/pr/*"

#Ignore files track
      gitignore = state --ignored --untracked-files=all
#hide,unhide and hidden
#
    hide   = update-index --skip-worktree
    unhide = update-index --no-skip-worktree
    hidden  = "!git ls-files -v | grep ^[hsS] | cut -c 3-"
#Freeze and unfreeze files
#
freeze = update-index --assume-unchanged
unfreeze = update-index --no-assume-unchanged
